title: Disappointing
text:
If this worked well it would be amazing. My main gripe is related to the widget. It always shows packages arriving today that aren‚Äôt actually arriving for days. If you open the app you‚Äôll see the actual arrival dates but for some reason the widget is always incorrect. It defeats the purpose of using the widget to quickly access information. 

Another gripe is having to log into my Amazon account repeatedly. Why is this necessary? Why can‚Äôt I stay logged in?

The only benefit to using this app is having all my package info available in one place but the lack of accuracy and inconvenience causes me to not use it unless I‚Äôm looking for a package that hasn‚Äôt arrived.

title: Love this app
text: I think Shop is an app that every shopper should have. It really is a place for all things. You can shop through many popular brands and track your package. On top of that you can gain ‚ÄúShop Cash offers‚Äù by making purchases through the app. After you rack up some points you can redeem them on eligible orders through the Shop app.  The only negative thing I have to say is that sometimes the package tracking isn‚Äôt available. It doesn‚Äôt happen all the time, but sometimes it does, and it can get frustrating since that‚Äôs kind of the whole idea behind the app.  Overall, the app is still great. I love that it personalizes your likes and interests. It will suggest products or brands based off those preferences and past purchases. It also will let you re-order a past purchase which is great for when you need to re-order your skincare products.
